datasets.query:
SELECT sum(amount)/10 as MRR FROM `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_orders o WHERE month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) = 
      (select max(month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) from `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_orders);

datasets.name: cfc23f3c
datasets.query: SELECT count(*)/12 as at_risk FROM `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_users WHERE churn=1

datasets.name: ad074d14
datasets.displayName: Churn - Predicted Churn Percent Payment Method - Universal (2)
datasets.query:
-- select * from `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_features;

SELECT p.country, p.churn, count(*) as customers
	FROM `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_features p
	GROUP BY p.country, p.churn

datasets.name: a6edb8f1
datasets.query:
SELECT cast(days_since_creation/30 as int) as days_since_creation, churn, count(*) as customers
   FROM `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_features
   GROUP BY days_since_creation, churn having days_since_creation < 1000

datasets.name: 5cb2b58a
datasets.query: SELECT user_id, churn from `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_users where churn=1

datasets.name: cf885f01
datasets.displayName: Churn - Subscriptions based on Internet Service (2)
datasets.query:
select platform, churn, count(*) as event_count from `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_app_events 
    inner join `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_users using (user_id) 
    where platform is not null
    group by platform, churn

datasets.name: f5076163
datasets.query:
SELECT sum(amount)/100 as MRR_at_risk FROM `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_orders o WHERE month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss')) = 
      (select max(month(to_timestamp(creation_date, 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'))) from `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_orders) and user_id in (SELECT user_id FROM `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_users WHERE churn=1);

datasets.name: 010acfce
datasets.query:
SELECT canal, count(*) as users_count
	FROM `ju_demos`.`dbdemos_retail_c360`.churn_features  WHERE churn =1  and canal is not null GROUP BY canal
